field.value: ATM does not work in an Initialize method of IInitializable

field.name: description
field.value:
I have a component that implements IInitializable. This class is declared Transactional and the method Initialize has the attribute Transaction(TransactionMode.Requires), but there is no automatic transaction being created when Initialize is being called after the container has created this component.
Other methods marked with the attribute Transaction in the same class, gives me automatic transactions.
I have tested this with version 3054 of the trunk.
